sourcesContent:
About Us

Our mission is to provide our customers with unparalleled customer support and to provide a product that is easy to use and understand. We are committed to providing our customers with the best possible experience. We are always looking for ways to improve our product and welcome any feedback you might have.

Task Management

Nodebucket is a task management application that allows users to create, view, and edit tasks. Users can also drag and drop tasks to change their status.

Some of the feedback we have received includes:

  • Great product! I use it every day
  • Very useful. I don't know how I lived without it.
  • I love this app. I split my life into two periods: before Nodebucket and after.

Mobile Accessibility

Nodebucket is available on both iOS and Android. There is no need to download the app from the App Store or Google Play. Our website is fully responsive and will work on any device.

Our Team

Our team is comprised of the following members:

Ayden Davis - Ayden is a seasoned developer with over 30 years of experience in the field. He has a Master's Degree in Computer Science and is currently pursuing his PhD. He is also a published author and has written two books on coding. He loves to code and teach new developers programming concepts.

Lili Carlson - Lili is a junior developer with 2 years of experience. She has a Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science and is currently pursuing her Master's Degree. She is a published author and has written two books on coding.
